entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
